forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few rain showers in the evening changing to a few snow showers overnight. Low 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 33F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
